byline.contributor: Jack Healy, Dave Philipps, Kassondra Cloos and Noel Black contributed reporting from Colorado Springs, and Benjamin Mueller, Ashley Southall, Jack Begg and Mike McIntire from New York.

abstract: Victims and witnesses of shooting rampage carried out by Robert L Dear Jr in Colorado Springs describe scene of fear and chaos as ordinary day suddenly erupted into carnage; hundreds of people were forced to take cover and were effectively held hostage for several hours, uncertain of when police would take control and where Dear would attack next.
lead_paragraph: A barrage of bullets turned a busy, snow-covered shopping center in Colorado Springs into a tableau of chaos and fear that lasted over five hours.

headline.main: In Colorado, Bustling With Shoppers, Then Gripped by Chaos
headline.print_headline: Bustling With Shoppers, Then Gripped by Chaos in Colorado

snippet: A barrage of bullets turned a busy, snow-covered shopping center in Colorado Springs into a tableau of chaos and fear that lasted over five hours.
